partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: At Legacy Concierge, our partnerships are the cornerstone of our unrivaled care, bringing together Southern California's finest healthcare providers to support you or your loved one.

list.name: Brightside Referrals
list.description: Trusted referral partner connecting clients with high-quality care resources.

list.name: Sollis Health
list.description: 24/7 concierge medical care, elevating patient experience and outcomes.

list.name: Prenuvo
list.description: Advanced whole-body MRI screening for proactive health insights.

list.name: Sleep Doc LA
list.description: Specialists in sleep medicine and comprehensive sleep diagnostics.

list.name: Appian
list.description: Technology partner powering efficient care coordination.

list.name: T/A
list.description: Trusted collaborator in patient care services.

list.name: Wellworth
list.description: Wellness partner supporting holistic health and recovery.

list.name: Mindfull
list.description: Behavioral health partner providing mindful mental wellness.

cta.title: Become a Partner
cta.text: We're expanding this premier network, inviting dedicated professionals to join us in advancing transformative care. Together, we elevate healthcare excellence.
